DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine activity docetaxel woman platinum resistant , refractory ovarian epithelial primary peritoneal serous cancer . OUTLINE : Patients receive docetaxel IV 30 minute day 1 , 8 , 15 . Courses repeat every 28 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients achieve complete response ( CR ) receive minimum 6 course therapy , include 2 course beyond CR . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 20-30 patient accrue study within 2 year .
